I can tell you about our organization, Guide you throgh our programs, provide you with the contact details of the organization
Bangalore Food Bank is an NGO with a mission to combat hunger, malnutrition, and food waste through its programmes.

patterns: why to donate to Banglore food bank?
How many people have benifitted through you?
responses: Bangalore Food Bank has purchased 519 tonnes of food products to date. We were able to provide more than 54 lakh feeds to the needy as a result of this.

patterns: How to reach out to you?
responses: You can reachout to us at , +91- 9538035252, or by dropping us an email at info@bangalorefoodbank.com. Our current address is Site No. 3 & 4, KHB Colony, Airport By-Pass Road, Yelahanka, Bangalore – 560064, India

We want to eliminate hunger at its root. We want to ensure that the voices of the malnourished and hungry in India are heard and their needs are met through our efforts. We also want to make people aware that a lot of food that would otherwise go to waste can be used to feed hungry stomachs. We connect donors with those in greatest need of food through our food distribution network.

patterns: Tell me about the Programs offered
responses: There are many programs that we offer which includes, NGO Feeding Program, Breakfast Feeding Program for School Children, Food Rescue Program, Food Relief Program

patterns: Tell me about the NGO feeding program
What is your NGO feeding programs
NGO feeding Program that you offer
what happens in NGO feeding program
responses: NGO feeding program involves service of sustainable supply of sufficient groceries such as rice, pulses, oil, sugar, flours and snacks every month to the identified NGOs

patterns: Tell me about the Breakfast feeding program
What is your breakfast feeding programs for school children
Breakfast feeding Program that you offer
what happens in Breakfast feeding program
responses: Breakfast feeding program involves service of serve freshly cooked hot nutritious breakfast for all the students on a regular basis at their schools

patterns: Tell me about the Food Rescue program
What is your Food Rescue Program
Food Rescue Program that you offer
what happens in Food Rescue program
responses: Items that are near expiration date are collected from manufacters which is then assessed for its safety to consume. Finally it is then distributed to the needy people through various community organizations

patterns: Tell me about the Food Relief program
What is your Food Relief Program
Food Relief Program that you offer
what happens in Food Relief program
responses: Natural disasters such as floods, earthquakes, and pandemics are uncontrollable part of human life. This Food Relief program is expected to address the food crises during such situations.
